verses.verse: Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> so that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And there was a certain <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of Zorah, <S%H6881><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Danites, <S%H1839><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Manoah; <S%H4495><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> was barren <S%H6135><s%> and had borne <S%H3205><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> [children.]

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to the woman, <S%H802><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to her, "Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> you are barren <S%H6135><s%> and have borne <S%H3205><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> [children,] but you shall conceive <S%H2029><s%> and give <S%H3205><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> to a son. <S%H1121><s%>

"Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, be careful <S%H8104><s%> not to drink <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> or strong <S%H7941><s%> drink, <S%H7941><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing. <S%H2931><s%>

"For behold, <S%H2009><s%> you shall conceive <S%H2030><s%> and give <S%H3205><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> to a son, <S%H1121><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> razor <S%H4177><s%> shall come <S%H5927><s%> upon his head, <S%H7218><s%> for the boy <S%H5288><s%> shall be a Nazirite <S%H5139><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> from the womb; <S%H990><s%> and he shall begin <S%H2490><s%> to deliver <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>"

Then the woman <S%H802><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H559><s%> her husband, <S%H376><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "A man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to me and his appearance <S%H4758><s%> was like the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the angel <S%H4397><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> awesome. <S%H3372><s%> And I did not ask <S%H7592><s%> him where <S%H335><s%> he [came] from, nor <S%H3808><s%> did he tell <S%H5046><s%> me his name. <S%H8034><s%>

"But he said <S%H559><s%> to me, 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> you shall conceive <S%H2030><s%> and give <S%H3205><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> to a son, <S%H1121><s%> and now <S%H6258><s%> you shall not drink <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> or strong <S%H7941><s%> drink <S%H7941><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> unclean <S%H2932><s%> thing, <S%H2932><s%> for the boy <S%H5288><s%> shall be a Nazirite <S%H5139><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> from the womb <S%H990><s%> to the day <S%H3117><s%> of his death. <S%H4194><s%>'"

Then Manoah <S%H4495><s%> entreated <S%H6279><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "O <S%H994><s%> Lord, <S%H136><s%> please <S%H994><s%> <S%H4994><s%> let the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Thou hast sent <S%H7971><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to us again <S%H5750><s%> that he may teach <S%H3384><s%> us what <S%H4100><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> for the boy <S%H5288><s%> who is to be born. <S%H3205><s%>"

And God <S%H430><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Manoah; <S%H4495><s%> and the angel <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> to the woman <S%H802><s%> as she was sitting <S%H3427><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> but Manoah <S%H4495><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> was not with her.

So the woman <S%H802><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> quickly <S%H4116><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> her husband, <S%H376><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> came <S%H935><s%> the [other] day <S%H3117><s%> has appeared <S%H7200><s%> to me."

Then Manoah <S%H4495><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> and followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> and when he came <S%H935><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Are you the man <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the woman <S%H802><s%>?" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "I am."

And Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Now <S%H6258><s%> when your words <S%H1697><s%> come <S%H935><s%> [to pass,] what <S%H4100><s%> shall be the boy's mode <S%H4941><s%> of life <S%H4941><s%> and his vocation <S%H4639><s%>?"

So the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Manoah, <S%H4495><s%> "Let the woman <S%H802><s%> pay <S%H8104><s%> attention <S%H8104><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> that I said. <S%H559><s%>

"She should not eat <S%H398><s%> anything <S%H3605><s%> that comes <S%H3318><s%> from the vine <S%H1612><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> or strong <S%H7941><s%> drink, <S%H7941><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> unclean <S%H2932><s%> thing; <S%H2932><s%> let her observe <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that I commanded. <S%H6680><s%>"

Then Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> let us detain <S%H6113><s%> you so that we may prepare <S%H6213><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> <S%H5795><s%> for you."

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Manoah, <S%H4495><s%> "Though <S%H518><s%> you detain <S%H6113><s%> me, I will not eat <S%H398><s%> your food, <S%H3899><s%> but if <S%H518><s%> you prepare <S%H6213><s%> a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> [then] offer <S%H5927><s%> it to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>" For Manoah <S%H4495><s%> did not know <S%H3045><s%> that he was the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "What <S%H4310><s%> is your name, <S%H8034><s%> so that when your words <S%H1697><s%> come <S%H935><s%> [to pass,] we may honor <S%H3513><s%> you?"
But the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Why <S%H4100><s%> do you ask <S%H7592><s%> my name, <S%H8034><s%> seeing it is wonderful <S%H6383><s%>?"

So Manoah <S%H4495><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the kid <S%H1423><s%> <S%H5795><s%> with the grain offering <S%H4503><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> it on the rock <S%H6697><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and He performed <S%H6213><s%> wonders <S%H6381><s%> while Manoah <S%H4495><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> looked <S%H7200><s%> on.

For it came <S%H1961><s%> about when the flame <S%H3851><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up from the altar <S%H4196><s%> toward heaven, <S%H8064><s%> that the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> ascended <S%H5927><s%> in the flame <S%H3851><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%> When Manoah <S%H4495><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> [this,] they fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces <S%H6440><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>

Now the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5750><s%> to Manoah <S%H4495><s%> or his wife. <S%H802><s%> Then <S%H227><s%> Manoah <S%H4495><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> that he was the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
So Manoah <S%H4495><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his wife, <S%H802><s%> "We shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die, <S%H4191><s%> for we have seen <S%H7200><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>"

But his wife <S%H802><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "If <S%H3863><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had desired <S%H2654><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> us, He would not have accepted <S%H3947><s%> a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and a grain offering <S%H4503><s%> from our hands, <S%H3027><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> would He have shown <S%H7200><s%> us all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, <S%H428><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> would He have let us hear <S%H8085><s%> [things] like this <S%H2088><s%> at this time. <S%H6256><s%>"

Then the woman <S%H802><s%> gave <S%H3205><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> to a son <S%H1121><s%> and named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Samson; <S%H8123><s%> and the child <S%H5288><s%> grew <S%H1431><s%> up and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> him.
And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to stir <S%H6470><s%> him in Mahaneh-dan, between <S%H996><s%> Zorah <S%H6881><s%> and Eshtaol. <S%H847><s%>
